entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 except minus 12 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3 except minus 12 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
